about.name: Angel Rosales
about.title: Full-stack developer
about.description: Experienced Web Developer adept in an assortment of skills focused mainly on JavaScript technologies such as ReactJS, Vue, Redux, NodeJS, Express and MongoDB

experiences.title: Full-Stack developer - Freelance
experiences.description: Wrote and edited web code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well making use of frameworks and libraries such as React and Vue, providing web solutions and develop websites and web applications based on specific business needs for promotions, presentations, customer service and online services.

experiences.title: Front-end Developer
experiences.description:
In this startup the main task was to develop the user interface implementing the SPA(Single Page Application) approach, thus making use of JavaScript's most popular library ReactJS, providing suitable and up-to-date solutions.
 Responsible for the architecture and Continuous Integration of future front-end applications.

education.title: Professional Full-Stack developer
education.description: This diplomat course is meant to teach its participants to apply and adapt the knowledge in web programming to the single-page applications (SPA) development using ReactJS advantages such as building large-scale applications with data that changes repeatedly over time while also boosting its productivity and making it easy to maintain.

education.title: English as a foreign Language
education.description: This course focuses on taking English basic knowledge up to a high level, where the student is able to maintain a fluent conversation, write and read proficiently.

education.title: Anthrophology
education.description: Scientific studies of humankind general aspects such as language, culture, biology, and society.

interests.title: Art
interests.description: Since I was a child I've had a deep passion for music and painting, being activities I still do nowadays in my free time. As a Front-end developer, I enjoy using painting knowledge like color theory to easily create layout designs, which are intuitive and likable for the users.
